title: Text Analyzer Refactor - Modular Design & Method Organization
description: Refactor a working text analyzer application from monolithic code into well-organized methods. Learn code organization, method extraction, file I/O design, and text analysis patterns. Transform all-in-main code into modular, maintainable software with proper separation of concerns.
learningObjectives: Understand code organization principles and why monolithic code is problematic
Learn to extract methods from monolithic all-in-main() code
Practice creating reusable methods for file I/O operations
Design a validation method for file handling
Build text analysis methods for counting (words, lines, sentences, characters)
Understand separation of concerns in file processing
Apply DRY (Don't Repeat Yourself) principle to eliminate duplication
Transform procedural file analysis code into modular, testable design
